pkgmetadata.longdescription: Clustering Communication Networks Using the Stochastic Topic Block Model Through Linkage.fr // It allows to cluster communication networks using the Stochastic Topic Block Model doi:10.1007/s11222-016-9713-7 by posting jobs through the API of the linkage.fr server, which implements the clustering method. The package also allows to visualize the clustering results returned by the server.
